play.db.jpa

类 GenericModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.db.jpa.JPABase
      • play.db.jpa.GenericModel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Model
    直接已知子类:
    JPASupport, Model

    @MappedSuperclass
public class GenericModel
extends JPABase
    A super class for JPA entities bran: lots of the method used to return , I changed them to , forgot why.... Was it because the impl from the JPAEnhancer used the JPQL.finds which return generic model?
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

        Refresh the entity state.

      • merge

        public <T extends GenericModel> T merge()
        Merge this object to obtain a managed entity (useful when the object comes from the Cache). Note: must use the returned object to invoke any further methods, such as save(). The original object remain detached.

      • count

        public static long count(String query,
                         Object... params)
        Count entities with a special query. Example : Long moderatedPosts = Post.count("moderated", true);
        参数:
        query - HQL query or shortcut
        params - Params to bind to the query
        返回:
        A long
